text: Not many updates coming probably in the next few days as I try to work in two different locations due to real-world construction noise. I have a big roof repair job going on, and, as you probably know it's raining almost every day and quite a lot, which makes the job take longer and makes the work riskier, but it has to happen now. I have to work this out. And not lose any work, and not break anything. A real high wire act.
